directions: Take a quarter of the package of noodles for each serving and place in boiling water for 3 to 4 minutes. Cook only until just soft (al dente) but not too soft; separate the strands while boiling. Drain in colander and immediately rinse with cold water. Cool noodles in the refrigerator. Mix with other ingredients and dressing.
ingredients: 1 broiled 3 ounce breast of chicken shredded or 3 oz of deveined cooked shrimp
2 scallions, sliced (both white and green parts)
1 16-ounce package of thin Chinese noodles or Soba noodles or angel hair pasta
2 tbsp balsamic or rice wine vinegar
title: Asian Noodle Dinner Salad
